description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. As one of the most elite pilots you've been invited to test a technologically advanced jet prototype with self-healing capabilities. Try to kill as many enemy drones as possible in this fast-paced air fight simulation. Show them what you've got!
description.short: As one of the most elite pilots you've been invited to test a technologically advanced jet prototype with self-healing capabilities. Try to kill as many enemy drones as possible in this fast-paced air fight simulation. Show them what you've got!
